xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: OM would like to thank the hospitality of the Centre for Quantum Geometry of Moduli Spaces, and Aarhus University, where part of this work was developed. His work was partially supported by the MINECO-FEDER project MTM2016-77093-P. AFS was partially supported by the Danish Council for Independent Research | Natural Sciences project DFF-6108-00358.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Facultad de Ciencias Matematicas, Departamento de Matematicas, Universidad de Valencia, C. Dr Moliner, 50, 46100 Burjassot, Valencia, Spain

organization.$: Centre for Quantum Geometry of Moduli Spaces

affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Mathematics, Centre for Quantum Geometry of Moduli Spaces, and Aarhus University Centre for Digitalisation, Big Data and Data Analytics, Aarhus University, Ny Munkegade 118, Bldg 1530, 8000 Aarhus, Denmark

head.abstracts: © 2019 IOP Publishing Ltd.We study the projective special Kähler condition on groups, providing an intrinsic definition of homogeneous projective special Kähler that includes the previously known examples. We give intrinsic defining equations that may be used without resorting to computations in the special cone, and emphasise certain associated integrability equations. The definition is shown to have the property that the image of such structures under the c-map is necessarily a left-invariant quaternionic Kähler structure on a Lie group.

grant-text.$: OM would like to thank the hospitality of the Centre for Quantum Geometry of Moduli Spaces, and Aarhus University, where part of this work was developed. His work was partially supported by the MINECO-FEDER project MTM2016-77093-P. AFS was partially supported by the Danish Council for Independent Research | Natural Sciences project DFF-6108-00358.
